slides.title: Welcome to CIMA P2
slides.content:
# P2 - Advanced Management Accounting

P2 covers **advanced costing** and **strategic decisions**.

## What You Will Learn

- **Pricing** - Advanced strategies
- **Costing** - Strategic methods
- **Decisions** - Long-term analysis
- **Control** - Advanced systems

## Syllabus Areas

| Area | Weight |
|------|--------|
| Pricing | 25% |
| Cost management | 30% |
| Long-term decisions | 25% |
| Control systems | 20% |

slides.title: Advanced Pricing
slides.content:
# Pricing Strategies

## Economic Approach

```
Profit maximization:
MR = MC

MR = Marginal Revenue
MC = Marginal Cost
```

## Price Elasticity

```
PED = % Change Q / % Change P

Optimal price:
P = MC x E / (E - 1)
```

## Strategic Pricing

| Strategy | Approach |
|----------|----------|
| Penetration | Low to gain share |
| Skimming | High initially |
| Price discrimination | Different segments |

slides.title: Quality Costing
slides.content:
# Cost of Quality

## Categories

| Type | Timing |
|------|--------|
| Prevention | Before production |
| Appraisal | During production |
| Internal failure | Before sale |
| External failure | After sale |

## Optimal Quality

```
Total Quality Cost minimized when:
Prevention + Appraisal balanced with Failure costs
```

## TQM Integration

- Continuous improvement
- Zero defects goal
- Six Sigma

slides.title: Long-Term Decisions
slides.content:
# Capital Investment

## Appraisal Methods

| Method | Criterion |
|--------|----------|
| NPV | > 0 Accept |
| IRR | > Cost of capital |
| Payback | < Target |
| ARR | > Target |

## NPV Calculation

```
NPV = Sum of [CF / (1+r)^n] - Investment
```

## Modified IRR

```
MIRR assumes reinvestment at cost of capital
```

Rank by PI and select

slides.title: Performance Measurement
slides.content:
# Advanced Measurement

## ROI and RI

```
ROI = Profit / Capital Employed

RI = Profit - (Capital x Cost)
```

## Economic Value Added

```
EVA = NOPAT - (Capital x WACC)
```

## Issues with ROI

- Short-term focus
- Dysfunctional behavior
- Investment disincentive
